description: Dashboard for Spring Boot2 Statistics(by micrometer-prometheus).

targets.expr: irate(http_server_requests_seconds_sum{instance="$instance", job="$application", exception="None", uri!~".*monitoring.*"}[5m]) / irate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{instance="$instance", job="$application", exception="None", uri!~".*monitoring.*"}[5m])

title: spring boot statistics
